item.title: The BeoPlay H8 wireless headphones have made their debut in Singapore
item.description: The Beoplay H8 headphones, in argilla bright. BANG & OLUFSEN introduces their wireless headphones: elegant and with a long battery life. The B&O PLAY headphones provide up to 14 hours of battery life with active noise cancellation. Their lightweight design features a sleek aluminum touch interface. Controlling the B&O PLAY Beoplay H8 on-ear headphones is done through gestures on the aluminum ear cup. Tapping and swiping can control various activities, like answering calls, adjusting the volume, selecting tracks, and activating or deactivating noise cancellation.
